title: Scott Joplin: king of ragtime composers
creator_credit: Anastos and Associates and Amelia Anderson
brief_description: Presents the life and music of ragtime musician, Scott Joplin, narrated by Eartha Kitt. Includes early film footage of the Mississippi River life and the 1904 St. Louis World’s Fair.
description: Presents the life and music of ragtime musician, Scott Joplin, narrated by Eartha Kitt. Includes early film footage of the Mississippi River life and the 1904 St. Louis World’s Fair.
